text: @MiciNorge @badandysoria @RealTimers @billmaher You guys are right that I was too unequivocal and imprecise. Particles do travel in the air. about 5-6 feet. Then they drop. Which is why all pub health officials say the main way the virus spreads is contact. Unless we're close together.
